name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven **Senior Frontend Engineer** with 13+ years of experience mastering **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React** to deliver high-performance applications. Proficient in **Angular** and adept at building dynamic user interfaces aligned with **Agile** methodology and best practices in **DevOps** and **CI/CD**. Skilled in developing microservices and employing design patterns, ensuring scalable and maintainable code utilizing **SOLID** principles.
Specialized in deploying cloud solutions on **AWS** and managing container orchestration with **Kubernetes**, contributing to robust and efficient software architecture. Experienced with databases including **DynamoDB**, **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Elasticsearch**, to enhance data management and retrieval.
Recognized for excellent bilingual communication skills and a commitment to aligning development processes with business needs.
